DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effectiveness physiotherapy application early postcesarean problem .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Physiotherapy Postcesarean Pain Functional Activities
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim investigate effectiveness physiotherapy application early postcesarean problem make difficulty functional activity , include physiotherapy intervention group control group . Physical characteristic , obstetrical surgical history , systemic problem , back pain , low back pain , headache , urinary/fecal incontinence problem bowel habit subject pregnancy postpartum period record . First ambulation time cesarean , presence syncope , related vital sign , onset time bowel peristalsis defecation also record . Intensities incisional pain difficulty perform functional activity evaluate daily 0-10 cm visual analogue scale ( VASs ) . Also , intensity back pain , low back pain , headache , bloat feel abdomen , fatigue also evaluate daily VASs . Physiotherapy program include breathing exercise , active joint movement low limb , posture exercise , connective tissue manipulation transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation .
DOC.criteria: cesarean section give birth single baby cesarean general anesthesia give birth multiple baby follow intensive care unit cesarean complication
